name: Expansion Demand
description: The citizens of your kingdom want expansion! If you successfully Claimed a Hex this turn, the result of your check for this event is improved one degree.

criticalSuccess.msg: Your citizens are pleased with the growth of the kingdom.

success.msg: You satisfy the citizens’ demands for growth, but if you don’t successfully Claim a Hex during your next Kingdom turn, increase Unrest by 1.

failure.msg: Your citizens remain unhappy with your kingdom’s growth. Increase Unrest by 1. If you don’t successfully Claim a hex during your next Kingdom turn, increase Unrest by 1 again.

criticalFailure.msg: As failure, but increase the Unrest by 2.

resolution: Achieve either a success or critical success at this event.
